attributes.action: Make County Council Councillors accountable/legally responsible for 'forcing' decisions on their 'constituents'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: County Councillors (Northumberland) are forcing a 2 tier education system, closing old people's homes, trying to force a single council (them) for the whol of Northumberland and forcing an Emmanual Foundation school that the public have voted against (In my opinion they are only looking at the financial incentive that this brings).
